comment:
[spoiler]I like to wrap up about this time, so we'll do the battle with the Obsidian Pegasus come Monday.

Next week is a little busier than I have been. In general, don't expect threads Sunday, Tuesday, and Thursday.

Thread's already archived. Thanks for reading, and let me know if you've any questions. I promise, I'm going to make upgrading skills a less hellish process by next time it happens.[/spoiler]
